column2: Going through the libraries of Alexandria you have come across so many documents that refer to a collection of books all categorising these things reffered to as 'the 7 wonders'. It is about time that we rebuild these great treasures of the world.\n§bThis will enable the construction of the last wonders.§!
One of the tattered books you found in Alexandria describes a great set of gardens, hanging over the cities near Babylon.

This magestic garden was build in the hopes to renew the legacy of the 7 wonders of humanity. It covers a grand area the size of a city and is a marvel from around the world. A true testament to the power and wisdom held my all nations.
The Temple of Artemis, a grand and wholly glorious structure. You wish recapture it's might and this is the time and place to do it.
Standing tall the New Temple of Artemis stands as one of the largest and grandest displays of Hellenic power and wealth.
It's said that Greeks used to perform a festival of... Might? Perhaps you can look into it later, one of your decendants even.
Towering high above anyone this great statue of Zeus would make most cities seem as small as ants. It is unknown how such a grand and lavish statue could ever be lost, forgotten or even destroyed.
What to build? Ah a colossus, a statue that will guard your trade and bring travellers far and wide to marvel at your architectural capabilities.
Once standing on the shores of Rhodes the statue of the Colossus was a grand sight to behold. One that was no less than this, a grand monument to the power of humanity.
